title: How to Fold a Note Into a Secret Triangle

steps.headline: Start with a regular piece of paper.
Fold the paper in half hot dog style.
steps.description: Make sure the paper is vertical.

steps.headline: Fold the paper over hot dog style again.
Fold the top left corner over diagonally.
You should now have a triangle at the top.
steps.description: Fold over the side of the triangle closest to you so the right side of the triangle is now closest to you.

steps.headline: Then take the bottom rectangle and fold to the right so that the left side lines up with half of the base of the triangle.
Flip over the paper and fold over the line.
Take the the top triangle and fold it toward you.
steps.description: Remember to turn the paper so the triangles point is at the top.

steps.headline: Fold both the left and right corners in so they match up with the triangle.
Lastly, tuck the left side of the triangle into the pouch on the right side.
steps.description: You are now ready to write, flick and ZOOM!

text: Start with a regular piece of paper.  Fold the paper in half hot dog style. Make sure the paper is vertical. Fold the paper over hot dog style again.  Fold the top left corner over diagonally.  You should now have a triangle at the top. Fold over the side of the triangle closest to you so the right side of the triangle is now closest to you. Then take the bottom rectangle and fold to the right so that the left side lines up with half of the base of the triangle.  Flip over the paper and fold over the line.  Take the the top triangle and fold it toward you. Remember to turn the paper so the triangles point is at the top. Fold both the left and right corners in so they match up with the triangle.  Lastly, tuck the left side of the triangle into the pouch on the right side. You are now ready to write, flick and ZOOM! Finished.
